description:
This course will equip you to be able to answer questions about evolution and creation regarding the fossil record.

The class includes a follow along note sheet, articles with questions to answer, and an optional ten question multiple choice quiz at the end.

The course is approximately 1 hour.

This course will help you understand why the Bible's claims about the origins of people and living organisms is not refuted by the fossil record.
title: 101  -  The Fossil Record vs. Evolution
